00217 #define hwloc_cpuset_foreach_begin(cpu, set) \
00218 do { \
00219         for (cpu = hwloc_cpuset_first(set); \
00220              (unsigned) cpu != (unsigned) -1; \
00221              cpu = hwloc_cpuset_next(set, cpu)) { \
00222 
00226 #define hwloc_cpuset_foreach_end() \
00227         } \
00228 } while (0)
